orderedList.text: This is a list item in an ordered list
An ordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is important. Top level item counters are digits
Lists can be nested inside of each other

sublist.text: This is a nested list item. After digits list items counters are lower-alpha.
This is another nested list item in an ordered list
This is a nested list item. After lower-alpha counters, lower-roman counters are used.
This is a nested list item. After lower-roman counters, the counters loop back to digits.
This is another nested list item in an ordered list
This is another nested list item in an ordered list

orderedList.text: This is the last list item
